item.description:
THE BOSTON DYKE MARCH 2011

6:00pm Dance to the music of Zili Misik
7:00pm March and Rally

...The Boston Dyke March is a non-commercial, community-centered, grassroots, inclusive queer event. Join thousands of dykes, lesbians, bisexuals, queers, genderqueers, transwomen, transmen, intersexuals, and allies marching for political and cultural change.

EXPRESS YOURSELF! Bring drums, noisemakers, whistles, signs, banners, puppets, friends, cheers, merriment, smiles, pride, and more….

FEATURING:

Keynote speaker: Urvashi Vaid
National LGBTQ rights activist http://www.urvashivaid.net/

Zili Misik
Boston’s own award-winning Afro-Caribbean New World Soul Band
http://www.zilimisik.com/live/

Mrs. Danvers
Boston’s hot new indie band
http://www.myspace.com/mrsdanverstheband

FUN WAYS TO PARTICIPATE

Dykes on scooters
Ride in the march on your scooter
Meet at the corner of Charles and Boylston, next to the dykes on bikes
[scooters are not permitted on the Boston Common}

Dykes on bicycles
Ride your bike at the tail of the march
For more info, contact: Jessica@againstthegrind.com

Drum troupe
Gather your friends and form a drum troupe
Bring your own drums or pick up them up near the Bandstand

Bring your community group
Bring your community group banner and march as a group
Just show up with your banner and people
For more info, contact: sarah.H10@gmail.com

Want to volunteer? Email us!
dykemarch@gmail.com

For more info about the dyke march:
www.bostondykemarch.com

ASL interpreted; wheelchair, stroller, and scooter accessible. Accessibility van available for those who need a ride for some or all of the March.

OFFICIAL DYKE MARCH AFTERPARTY
just a short walk from the Boston Common!
Presented by DykeNight
http://www.dykenight.com/dykemarch.html

Friday, June 10, 2010
9:00 pm -2:00 am
FELT NIGHTCLUB
533 Washington Street, Boston

--------------------------------------------
The Boston Dyke March is for everyone! lesbians - dykes – queers - bi-women - boychicks - tomboys - grrrls - lesbian moms - lesbianas - femmes - butches - transwomen - androgs - transmen - gay girls - bois - womanists – fat dykes -sorority girls with pearls who are sleeping together - dykes on bikes - lesbian crones - african american lesbians -rural dykes - goddesses - genderqueers - poly girls - amazons - hippy chicks - lipstick lesbians - asian dykes - lesbian avengers - dykes in wheelchairs - wise old lesbians - leather dykes – babydykes ... and You!

group.who: Friends of the Boston Dyke March
group.name: The Boston Dyke March
